'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
A long-destroyed inn that remains in use thanks to the undead occupying the Reef.

==Points of interest==
* The inn is an interesting place, full of undead looking to... Have a good time while undead? The cheery dargul in the room with the blood-stained fabric will give you a welcome, while the tavernkeeper will offer you drinks and will tell you a bit about the reef.
* Speak to [[Copperhead]] on the balcony to start the quest [[A Paradise of the Mind]], after which [[Zulka]] and her gang of unfriendly dargul's will enter the tavern with word of more "supplies" for the townfolk.

==Characters==
* [[Copperhead]], a friendly dargul (well, more friendly than the rest).
* [[Zulka]], fampyr... Provisioner.

==Loot==
* [[Bonnie]]: In the northwestern room, by the cheerful dargul.
* [[Grave Hound Pup]]: Sold by the tavern keeper.
* Minor loot in the hidden box on the piano.

==Trivia==
* The Pickled Eel was originally called "Ramshackle Abode" during development.
{{DEFAULTSORT:Pickled Eel, The}}
title: The Pickled Eel
